## NormContent type

Normalized content types for message content

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type NormContent = {
    type: 'text';
    text: string;
} | {
    type: 'image';
    url?: string;
    data?: string;
    mime?: string;
    alt?: string;
} | {
    type: 'tool_result';
    toolName?: string;
    callId?: string;
    result: unknown;
};
```
